titleStmt.title: A new ballad, called, the Protestants prophesie Wherein is plainly set forth the difficulty of clearing our native country, of those that infest us, called Papists. To the tune of, When covetousness out of England will run.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come hearken to me whilst the truth I do write,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
